title: SIMple Mechanics Tutorial
snippet: SIMple Mechanics is the simulator meant for the kinematics, projectile motions, and collisions sections of high school physics.Download/InstallationWindows Download the latest windows release from the Github releases page. It should be called SIMple-Mechanics-windows.zip. Unzip the folder in a ...

title: Collisions Lab
snippet: SetupLoad the collisionlab.lua file using the “Load World” button in the top menu:You should see something like this:The scene is paused on load in.
